channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: United Airlines' first-quarter outlook outpaces estimates after profits surge to end 2024
item.description: United topped analysts' estimates for fourth-quarter earnings and the airline's first-quarter outlook.

item.title: Treasury Yields Rise a Little as Tariffs Are Delayed
item.description: Treasury yields edged up, reclaiming some lost ground as markets digest Trump’s relatively mild approach to tariffs at the start of his second term.

item.title: Here's what it will take for Apple to get out of its 2025 funk
item.description: Evercore ISI said China may be a "key wildcard" for Apple during the company's upcoming fiscal Q1 release on Jan. 30.

item.title: Netflix shares soar as company reports surging revenue, tops 300 million subscribers
item.description: The fourth quarter was the last for which Netflix will report quarterly paid subscriber counts.

item.title: Procter & Gamble earnings beat estimates as shoppers buy more household staples
item.description: Procter & Gamble beat quarterly earnings and revenue estimates and also reiterated its fiscal 2025 forecast.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise Amid Tariff Threats
item.description: Gold futures rose, with tariff threats set to keep demand high.

item.title: TSMC net profit hits record high as fourth-quarter results top expectations on robust AI chip demand
item.description: TSMC, the world's largest contract chip manufacturer, produces advanced processors for clients such as Nvidia and Apple and has benefited from the meg...

item.title: Nasdaq Leads Gains as Netflix Stock Jumps
item.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow industrials all notched gains as AI-linked stocks surged.

item.title: Sterling Could Recover if U.K. Government Boosts Economic Prospects
item.description: Sterling could recover against the euro in coming months if the U.K. government works to improve consumer and business confidence, Commerzbank said. S...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Edge Higher
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures recovered some of Tuesday’s heavy losses with freezing weather continuing this week across much of the country and traders ke...
